info: Rating, 5 stars,  · 1 week ago,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
Felt very grateful to Mr Hasib’s place as I was able to reunite my whole family after a long time. Location was great. We didn’t have to go to outside Dhanmondi at all. We were able to shop and enjoy delicious foods near this place. I will definitely come back to this place next time I visit Bangladesh. I would like to recommend Mr. Hasib’s place.
Mr Momin was very helpful. He made check in and check out process very easy to follow. He was very responsive whenever we had any questions. Thanks Mr. Momin.
Mr. Hasib was an excellent host. My family had a wonderful stay at this place. We enjoyed our time there, it was so conveniently located. Would definitely recommend.

We loved this flat. Very clean, great location, and extremely spacious. The owner and manager were both responsive, respectful, and caring. They were very accommodating with some last minute check-in and check-out adjustments due to our flights changing. Communication was not a problem and they made sure to provide whatever we needed - cleaning, wifi router changes, etc. - promptly.

info: Rating, 1 star,  · August 2023,  · Stayed with kids
rating_comment:
Very bad experience I don’t recommend
Any one. What they said nothing makes me
Impressed after all not professional

I didn't meet Mr. Hasib but talked with him over phone. He is very accomotative. His Manager Mr. Mumin made sure that our stay was enjoyable and took care of us in every way possible. He is a nice gentelman.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · November 2022,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Great experience to stay in
Very nice place. Will definitely stay here again.

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · June 2022,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
Great location, quite, easy check in and check out process. The apartment is bright and airy. The host is easy to reach.
However, the apartment seems to be empty most of the time and therefore locks, doors and bathroom showers don’t work well.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · June 2022,  · Stayed with kids
rating_comment: This is a wonderful apartment that was very comfortable for our family of 6. The apartment was nice and very clean. Hasib was very easy to communicate with. He answered our questions quickly and quickly stopped by the apartment when we had a small problem. We appreciated having AC in the bedrooms and the living area. Only one bathroom has a hot water heater, but during hot season a cold shower is okay. This apartment is located in a nice part of Dhaka, and is within walking distance of Meena Bazar, a very nice supermarket. Many nice restaurants are close by as well. We are glad we stayed at this apartment and will stay here again when we come back to Dhaka!
Great place
Couldn’t have been better. Apartment was beautiful and equipped with everything I needed (and lots of lovely touches / local design). Mr. Hasib was very helpful and the location was great.
Place with great location. Restroom essentials could be included otherwise it is a great place to stay

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · February 2020,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment:
Hasib was very commutative and tried to do his best to pleased us.
The flat is safe and well located, but Dhaka’s traffic will be around all the city.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · January 2020,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Amazingly large and beautiful place. Good location, great place and excellent customer service
Great, spacious apartment in heart of one Dhaka’s great neighborhoods. Close to food, transport & shopping. Would book again.

Thank you for everything.
He is a great host
Beautiful apartment, Hasib has been a fantastic host. Things were pretty well organised.
Loved the place!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · August 2017,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment: The apartment was great. Each and every corner of the apartment was beautiful. It was very spacious. We had a wonderful stay. Hasib had been a wonderful host. He responded immediately whenever contacted, and he made sure we did not have any problems during our stay.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · August 2017,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Very nice and clean apartment. Host was very helpful. Highly recommended.
